name: Loki
description: Loki (LOKI) is a private, secure, and untraceable digital currency based on the CryptoNote protocol. Lokiâ€™s hybrid Proof-of-Work and Proof-of-Service consensus mechanism confirms blocks and maintains the self-regulating network. Launched in 2018, the Melbourne-based startup is leveraging its technology to enable Lokinet (incentivized mixnet) and Loki Messenger (decentralized messaging), offering a higher degree of metadata protection and anonymity. For more information, visit loki.network.
